about_the_game:
Simplicity and Depth

As the Champion, you command your units and spells. Without a mana or energy system, you can play all of the cards in your hand, as the game’s strategy relies on which cards to play, and where on the battlefield you deploy them.



The goal is to deal damage directly to the opponent’s banner, but to do that, you will need to defeat the forces deployed against you. Conversely, the enemy is trying to deal damage directly to your Champion. Without ally units in the battlefield, attacks target your Champion directly.

The Power of a Champion

Champions lead from the rear and direct their troops. As your forces are eliminated and spells are cast, your Champion gains the power to activate unique ability cards that can help turn the flow of battle. Each of the 20+ Champions has a unique design, each with its own tactics and flavor.

Recruitment and Promotions

You begin your adventure with one Champion of the Scales faction, but more are unlocked through accomplishing various gameplay objectives. Each faction has access to 4 special promotion gems that allow you to augment your cards, which are earned through a variety of means throughout the campaign. As you travel through each of the enemy territories you will have the opportunity to recruit enemy units and salvage foreign promotion gems to unlock a nearly unlimited combination of game-breaking effects.

The Adventure Begins

Each adventure pushes your Champion through three procedural enemy regions, offering a unique experience every time. Choose your path through enemy territory wisely, selecting between challenging encounters with greater rewards on your way to the final clash with an epic Champion.
- Enemy encounters to collect money and new cards
- Special battle locations to earn promotion gems
- Mini-bosses to collect relics
- Stores to buy and trade resources
- Taverns to collect missions with special rewards
- Portal anomalies that lead to distant regions
- Shortcuts unlocked by bribing the locals

Dragon Front: Adventures Early Access

- 6 hostile regions/factions
- 25 unique units and 15 spells per region
- 4 unique champions per region – each with legendary abilities
- 6 mini-bosses per region
- 5 battle mutators per region
- 20 supply cards
- 50+ relics

Active Development

Dragon Front: Adventures is currently being developed.

short_description: Dragon Front: Adventures is a turn-based, deckbuilding roguelike where you take charge of a legendary Champion and build your forces by collecting units, spells, supplies and relics. Explore unique combinations to overwhelm the opposition.
